nodes.text: Cordol's Chain was a bounty hunter group that operated on the moon Nar Shaddaa. During the Galactic Civil War, Cordol's Chain was hired by the Hutt Noako to attack agents of his rival Hutt Sinasu. A member of Sinasu's organization informed the bounty hunters that the Hutt had gone into hiding in the the shop of the outlaw tech gang TechTank, and Cordol's Chain subsequently staged an attack on the facility.
